title: Monarch
description: A distributed execution engine for PyTorch workloads.
keywords: distributed execution engine single controller actor framework ProcMesh ActorMesh DeviceMesh Hyperactor fault tolerance PAFT cluster orchestration torchmonarch Ray alternative TorchTitan TorchFT SLURM Kubernetes parallelism
